• VXLIB Function Reference
TableLookup

OpenVX Function Description

  • Implements the Table Lookup Image Kernel.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/d5/d4e/group__group__vision__function__lut.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_tableLookup_i8u_o8u : Input and output images are U8 format
  • VXLIB_tableLookup_i16s_o16s : Input and output images are S15 format
